sn48.51:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava kosalesu viharati salaya brahmanagame.
sn48.51:1.4: “seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchanagata pana, siho migaraja tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—thamena javena surena;
sn48.51:1.5: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya.
sn48.51:2.2: Saddhindriyam, bhikkhave, bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati;
sn48.51:2.3: viriyindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati;
sn48.51:2.4: satindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati;
sn48.51:2.5: samadhindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati;
sn48.51:2.6: pannindriyam bodhipakkhiyo dhammo, tam bodhaya samvattati.
sn48.51:2.7: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ye keci tiracchanagata pana, siho migaraja tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—thamena javena surena;
sn48.51:2.8: evameva kho, bhikkhave, ye keci bodhipakkhiya dhamma, pannindriyam tesam aggamakkhayati, yadidam—bodhaya”ti.
